title: Bulgur salad with cucumber, feta cheese and grapes
ingredients: ['225g bulgur wheat', '350ml boiling water', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 medium cucumber, diced', '400g white grapes, halved or quartered depending on size', '300g feta cheese, crumbled', '1 heaped tablespoon minced parsley', '1 lemon, juiced', '3 to 4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar', 'pepper to taste']
